sub_title: Presales Engineer | SaaS & on-prem OT solutions | AWS, Azure & CompTIA certified
summary:
I'm a "digitalized" mechanical engineer, specialized on bringing together Operational Technology and Information Technology. 
I've worn the hats of product support engineer, solution consultant, product manager and presales engineer.

I work with AVEVA's Operations portfolio, covering solutions for plant supervision, information management and predictive analytics for asset maintenance and process optimization. 
My job and passion is to help customers clarify their goals and translate them into a secure enterprise architecture and a realistic user adoption journey.

When I'm not busy tinkering with new technologies, you'll find me playing with Lego with my son or walking my dog in the rainy English countryside.

projects.title: Highly Available Central Architecture for Real-Time Pilots in Air Liquide
projects.description:
The project delivered a cloud-based, highly available PI System architecture to Air Liquide Smart Innovative Operations centers. 
The architecture provides a 99.9% yearly availability, is deployed on AWS and leverages the following services: EC2, Auto-Scaling Group, Network Load Balancer, Cloudformation.
I contributed to the project from the early stages, specifically by: designing and validating the architecture with the PI System vendor (OSIsoft), AWS and Air Liquide's IT department; sizing the VM instances; estimating the project's OPEX and CAPEX; selecting and onboarding the external consultant in charge of the PI System deployment and coordinating with the wider deployment team to ensure a successful and timely delivery of the architecture.

contributors.headline: Presales Engineer | SaaS & on-prem OT solutions | AWS, Azure & CompTIA certified

projects.title: OneSCADA Portal for Air Liquide Large Industries
projects.description:
The OneSCADA Portal is a centralized web portal to access OT content generated by Air Liquide users. The content includes: plant sites presentations, operational displays, internal knowledge articles about business applications and much more. The portal offers a powerful search engine, which allows users to quickly identify the displays containing the desired information.
As a technical project manager, I translated the customer's needs into User Stories, helped the Development team assess priorities and provided technical expertise on how to index the PI Vision web content via the SQL backend. I worked in conjunction with the financial PM to ensure compliance with the budget constraints and a timely delivery of the project.

profile_positions.description:
My main responsibilities:
•	understand customer requirements and their business challenges
•	deliver no-nonsense product demonstrations
•	help customers design their enterprise data architecture
•	provide technical expertize for RFIs, RFPs, PoCs and pilot projects
•	present at international and regional events
profile_positions.title: Presales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
ALIZENT is a global digital integrator belonging to the Air Liquide group. It has 250+ employees operating in 10 countries in AMER, EMEA and APAC. The Supervision & Control team serves more than 300 plants leveraging the PI System by OSIsoft (now part of AVEVA) and in-house software tools enhancing the value of the Operational Data.

My main responsibilities:
•	coordinate a global team of over 10 product experts with a wide range of expertise
•	liaise with the development team to prioritize backlog items and release new functionalities
•	discuss the product roadmap with key customers
•	work closely with Sales, Business Development and Marketing teams to ensure the consistency of the product catalogue and the value proposition
profile_positions.title: Supervision and Control Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
My main responsibilities:
•	deliver projects leveraging the PI System by OSIsoft and AWS solutions
•	perform new software deployments and data migrations for Air Liquide and other customers
•	provide level 3 technical support to front-line engineers
profile_positions.title: Solutions Engineer

profile_positions.description:
My main responsibilities:
•	deliver complex deployments of the PI System software suite
•	provide technical support for all products (1 500+ tickets) and produce detailed reports in English, French and Italian.
•	create and provide customized on-site workshops and hands-on labs at international events
•	provide presales support for new prospects and host sessions at regional events
•	coach colleagues on writing technical documentation and create knowledge-based articles
•	collaborate with universities and delivered workshops to students
profile_positions.title: Product Support Engineer II

profile_positions.description:
My main responsibilities:
•	troubleshoot technical issues
•	provide standard public trainings
•	collaborate with universities for educational activities
